name: JUMPSUIT
description: "I remember a stay in Portofino that has remained imprinted in my olfactory memory. My hotel overlooked a grove of magnolia trees in full blossom on a very steep slope that dove straight into the sea. Intrepid and fascinated, I leaned over to savour their fresh floral scent. A marvel! This instant was a great inspiration to me when I composed Jumpsuit." - Carlos Bena√Øm, Perfumer.
